page.title: 10LEISURE West Forres
page.content: There is a wide variety of leisure activities available in this area which lends itself to the general countryside pursuits of walking,birdwatching,nature study etc.The River Findhorn is leased by Forres Angling Association for salmon and sea trout fishing.On the Altyre Estate the Moray Orienteering Club have mapped several routes which are frequently used.On many summer week-ends Mundole Farm is used for show jumping and horse riding events.There is a rifle range on West Pilmuir Road.Many people in the area travel to Forres for recreational activities,clubs and societies.Several people enjoy bowling at Mundole Court and some also travel to COnicavel for this in the winter months.
